Steps.Message: Update at 07:39 - Thanks for signing up to our SMS updates, my name is Talie and I'll be passing on news from our field teams while they work to get your power back on. Our staff are on the way to the St Leonards Road area, and our estimated timeframe to have power back on is currently between 10:00 and 11:00. However, this could change once our staff have assessed. We believe these issues are being caused by a cabling fault and if this has developed to a severe enough stage, the cabling circuit may be broken - this means further specialist staff can use fault finding equipment to locate and repair it. I'll let you know once our teams arrive, but we're always here to speak to on 08003163105.

We became aware of a power cut at 07:10. We’re sorry for any disruption this may have caused you. We didn’t know in advance there would be a power cut but now that we know, our teams will do everything they can to get your power back quickly.
Steps.Name: Power cut reported

Steps.Message: We have engineers on their way. As this is affecting your area, they will not need to attend your property. Rest assured once they arrive, they’ll work as quickly as is safely possible to get your power back on.
Steps.Name: Engineers on their way

IncidentCategoryCustomerFriendlyDescript: A fault occurred on a piece of our electrical equipment which controls the power to your home.
